microsoft/sammo

Tool for building and optimizing prompt programs for large language models

Related repos

  • Automate language model prompts and workflows using JavaScript or TypeScript scripts
  • AI agent framework for connecting language models with other AI tools
  • LLaMA Factory is a framework for fine-tuning large language models
  • structured prompt templates for LLMs, like programming for prompts
  • large language model tutorials and training basics from scratch
  • toolkit for compressing and deploying large language models
  • Run large language models in a browser
  • tools for finetuning language models with instruction datasets and preference optimization
  • markup language for structuring LLM prompts
